name: Spirit Race
description:
Spirit Race is a platformer made on Unreal Engine where the main goal is to reach all the elements of the world and unite them to reconstruct it and see what happens. You will find different worlds with different arts and each one with its owns mechanics and dangers.

Each element will consist on a level, complete the level, take the element to the skies and reunite it with the rest of them. There is no order on the elements, it depends on you. Each level will have its mechanics and its art based on the element you will have to take on. The world you have to reconstruct is wounded and it can kill you, so be dangerous because everything that seems beautiful from far, cannot be if you are near enough. A good set of skills will be required, are you good enough to save this world?

Spirit Race is not completed at all. The water level is still on the way and it will be coming on the next few days!
